FILE: cm002225v11.0.txt
DYAD: USA - SWITZERLAND
RIVALRY: RIV48
DISPUTE(S): MID3209 MID2870 

RIVNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170731
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170731

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3209 

TERRMID: MID3209 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID3209 from NYT 10/5/1954, a US jet violated Swiss airspace and was pursued by Swiss fighter planes outside of Swiss airspace. Coded not territory because there was no territorial dispute and the US was not challenging Swiss territorial sovereignty here.

TERRLINK: MID3209 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3209 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3209 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3209 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3209 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3209 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3209 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3209 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2870 

TERRMID: MID2870 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2870 from NYT 3/20/1959, a US recon plane was grounded by Swiss fighters after violating Swiss airspace. The plane was released soon thereafter. Coded not territory because there was no territorial dispute and this was not a challenge of Swiss territorial sovereignty. 

TERRLINK: MID2870 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2870 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2870 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2870 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2870 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2870 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2870 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2870 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

SOURCES-CM:
